Song.title: Alas, And Did My Savior Bleed (Kauflin)
Song.copyright: Words by Isaac Watts Music by Bob Kauflin © 1996 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B000YZKL7I","title":"Alas, and Did My Savior Bleed","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/516fS-1BfuL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]Alas! and [G/B]did my [C]Savior [Dsus D]bleed? And [Em]did my [D]Sovereign [C]die? Would [G/B]He dev[C]ote that [Dsus4]sa[D]-cred [Em]head For [Am7]such a worm as [Dsus4 D]I? Was [G]it for [G/B]sins that [C]I had [Dsus4 D]done, He [Em]groaned up[D]on the [C]tree? Am[G/B]azing [C]pity! [Dsus4 D]Grace unkn[Em]own! And [Am7]love bey[Dsus4 D]ond degr[Gsus4 G]ee!
Chorus: My [Bm]God, why would You [Em]shed Your blood So [Am7]pure and undef[Dsus4 D]iled To [Bm]make a sinful [C]one like [G/B]me Your [Am7]chosen, [Dsus4 D]precious [C | G/B | Am7 | Dsus4 D | (G) |]child.
Verse 2: Well [G]might the [G/B]sun in [C]darkness [Dsus4 D]hide And [Em]shut His [D]glories [C]in When [G/B]Christ, the [C]mighty [Dsus4 D]Maker, [Em]died For [Am7]man the creature’s [Dsus4 D]sin Thus [G]might I [G/B]hide my [C]blushing [Dsus4 D]face, While [Em]His dear [D]cross ap[C]pears Dis[G/B]solve my [C]heart in [Dsus4 D]thankful[Em]ness And [Am7]melt my [Dsus4 D]eyes to [Gsus4 G]tears.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 alas and did my savior bleed and did my sovereign die would he devote that sacred head for such a worm as i was it for sins that i had done he groaned upon the tree amazing pity grace unknown and love beyond degree chorus my god why would you shed your blood so pure and undefiled to make a sinful one like me your chosen precious child verse 2 well might the sun in darkness hide and shut his glories in when christ the mighty maker died for man the creatures sin thus might i hide my blushing face while his dear cross appears dissolve my heart in thankfulness and melt my eyes to tears

Arrangement.description: Arrangement from Songs For The Cross-Centered Life
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G2 | Cmaj7/G | Em2 Gmaj7/D | C2]
Verse 1: [G]Alas, and did my [Gsus]Savior bleed? And [Em]did my [D6]Sovereign [Cmaj9]die? Would [G/B]He dev[C2]ote that [Dsus]sacred [Em]head For [Am]such a [G2]worm as [D2/F# C/E D]I? Was [G2]it for sins that [Gsus]I had done, He [Em]groaned up[D6]on the [C]tree? Am[G/B]azing [C]pity! [D]Grace unkn[Em]own! And [Am7sus]love bey[D7sus]ond degr[Gsus G]ee!
Chorus: My [Bm7]God, why would You [Em]shed Your blood So [Am7]pure [G/B]and un[C]defile[Dsus D]d To [Bm7]make a sinful [Cmaj7]one like [G/B]me Your [Am]chosen, [Dsus D]precious [G2]child? [| Cmaj7/G |]
Verse 2: Well [G2]might the sun in [Gsus]darkness hide And [Em]shut His [D6]glories [Cmaj9]in When [G/B]Christ, the [C2]mighty [Dsus D]Maker, [Em]died For [Am7]man the [G2]creature’s [D/F# C/E D]sin Thus [Em2]might I hide my [D6]blushing face, While [C]His dear [Bm]cross ap[A2]pears Dis[G/B]solve my [A/C#]heart in [B/D#]thankful[Em]ness And [Am2]melt my [D7sus D]eyes [C/E]to tear[D/F# G (to chorus)]s.
Ending: [Cmaj7/F | Em2 D6 | F2 | G2 |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 alas and did my savior bleed and did my sovereign die would he devote that sacred head for such a worm as i was it for sins that i had done he groaned upon the tree amazing pity grace unknown and love beyond degree chorus my god why would you shed your blood so pure and undefiled to make a sinful one like me your chosen precious child verse 2 well might the sun in darkness hide and shut his glories in when christ the mighty maker died for man the creatures sin thus might i hide my blushing face while his dear cross appears dissolve my heart in thankfulness and melt my eyes to tears ending
